Posts.Content: agross wrote: I am working with a patient education group to develop tools which wil help women better understand HER2 cancers.  We would like to learn more about your experience with breast cancer to help others coping with the disease. What questions did you have when you learned you had HER2 positive cancer? What resources did your doctor provide to you which you found helpful in inderstanding HER2 cancer? Why were these important? Were there any resources which were not helpful?  Why? What should doctors know about your experience with HER2 positive cancer? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Understanding HER2 and Metastatic Cancer agross LumiPojo
